description: Adds permissions to the resource-based policy of a version of an Lambda layer. Use this action to grant layer usage permission to other accounts. You can grant permission to a single account, all accounts in an organization, or all Amazon Web Services accounts. To revoke permission, call  RemoveLayerVersionPermission with the statement ID that you specified when you added it.

parameters.name: LayerName
parameters.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the layer.

parameters.name: StatementId
parameters.description: An identifier that distinguishes the policy from others on the same layer version.

parameters.name: Action
parameters.description: The API action that grants access to the layer. For example, lambda:GetLayerVersion.

parameters.name: Principal
parameters.description: An account ID, or * to grant layer usage permission to all accounts in an organization, or all Amazon Web Services accounts (if organizationId is not specified). For the last case, make sure that you really do want all Amazon Web Services accounts to have usage permission to this layer.

nested_items.name: RevisionId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the current revision of the policy.
